statements: UPDATE supplier_management SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier 1', contact_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET quantity = 50, price = 25.00 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE supplier_management SET performance_rating = 5 WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_tracking SET price = 25.99, quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE product_id = 10;
UPDATE supplier_contacts SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier', contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE performance_records SET performance_rating = 4, date_recorded = '2022-09-15' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE supplier_contacts SET contact_person = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE performance_records SET performance_rating = 5, date_recorded = '2022-01-01' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_person = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, description = 'New and improved' WHERE product_id = 10;

UPDATE products SET price=19.99, description='Updated Product Description' WHERE product_id=2;

UPDATE supplier_ratings SET rating_value=4, rating_date='2022-09-20', reviewer_name='Alice Smith' WHERE supplier_id = 2;
